snippet: A new institute, financed by the insurance industry, not only believes in global warming but also supports a carbon tax to combat it.
abstract: Eduardo Porter Economic Scene column on how insurance industry sees their future amid concerns of climate change; says companies' analysis of risks it faces is evolving; Heartland Institute, financed by insurance industry, not only believes in global warming, but supports carbon tax to combat it.
lead_paragraph: A new institute, financed by the insurance industry, not only believes in global warming but also supports a carbon tax to combat it.

headline.main: For Insurers, No Doubts on Climate Change
